basics.name: Kaianu Reyes-Huynh
basics.label: Software Developer
basics.summary: I am a Computer Engineering major with background in front-end development and mobile automation testing

highlights: Developed features using ReactNative for seamless data storage and sharing
Implemented an asynchronous data storage feature, enabling sharing of data among users and enhancing overall usability

Cross-platform mobile app expertise: Gained hands-on experience in developing a cross-platform mobile application using React Native. Ensured compatibility and optimal performance across iOS and Android platforms, delivering a consistent user experience.

Agile problem-solving and collaboration skills: Thrived in an Agile development environment as a Software Engineering intern. Collaborated effectively with a multidisciplinary team, resolving technical challenges and contributing to timely project milestones.
Tested and validated 15 modified camera exposure datasets, using Python scripts, to ensure correct optimization parameters
Optimized manual testing of mobile applications by developing & maintaining end-to-end automation test cases comprising 200+ features using Appium

Conducted comprehensive testing of camera exposure, white balance, and working distance for over 20 different device/OS combinations to generate datasets for a machine learning algorithm, contributing to 50% increase in correct values read from a phone.
